backend.app.database package¶

Submodules¶

backend.app.database.connection module¶

async backend.app.database.connection.connect_to_db()[source]¶

Called ONCE at application startup. Creates and warms the asyncpg pool.

async backend.app.database.connection.get_db()[source]¶

FastAPI dependency. Uses an already-initialized pool. NEVER creates a pool on request.
